series_description: This series documents the reviews of jails following an death to determine whether the jail was and is in compliance with the minimum standards of the Board of Local and Regional Jails. This series may include, but is not limited to: court orders, forms, reports, medical charts, logs, video, and discharge summaries.

series_title: Jail Inspection Reports: Life, Health, and Safety
series_description: This series documents the annual inspections of jails, regional jails, and lockups owned and operated by localities and authorities. This series may include, but is not limited to: inspection forms/reports
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_title: Serious Incident Reports: Jails and Lockups
series_description: This series documents the mandated reporting of serious incidents such as deaths, discharging of firearms, erroneous releases, escapes, fires requiring evacuation of inmates, hostage situations, and the recapture of escapees that occur local jails and lockups. This series may include, but is not limited to: initial and final reports
